title: INtopBackup
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: DHL reverses course and resumes shipping packages valued over $800 to U.S. consumers
items.description: The policy reversal comes one week after the global shipping company said it would halt such shipments due to new U.S. customs rules.

items.title: Police raids across France after wave of prison attacks
items.description: Police make 25 arrests so far as officers target Paris, Marseille, Bordeaux and, the city of Lyon.

items.title: Conclave to elect new pope to begin on 7 May, Vatican says
items.description: The closed-door meeting will begin in the Sistine Chapel and will involve some 135 cardinals from across the world.
